name: set_workspace
description: Set workspace directory and initialize project. Automatically detects project type, validates path, and offers to initialize Context Sync features with user consent.

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: Absolute path to the project directory (must exist and be accessible)

name: get_project_context
description: Get the current project context including recent decisions and conversations

name: save_decision
description: Save an important technical decision or architectural choice

arguments.name: type
arguments.desc: Type of decision (architecture, library, pattern, configuration, other)

name: save_conversation
description: Save a conversation snippet for future reference

name: read_file
description: Read a file from the current workspace

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: Path to the file relative to workspace

name: get_project_structure
description: Get the file/folder structure of current workspace

name: scan_workspace
description: Scan workspace and get overview of important files

name: create_file
description: Preview file creation (does NOT create the file yet)

name: modify_file
description: Preview file modification (does NOT modify the file yet)

name: delete_file
description: Preview file deletion (does NOT delete the file yet)

name: apply_create_file
description: Actually create the file after user approval

name: apply_modify_file
description: Actually modify the file after user approval

arguments.name: changes
arguments.desc: Array of file changes to apply

name: apply_delete_file
description: Actually delete the file after user approval

name: undo_file_change
description: Undo the last modification to a file

name: search_files
description: Search for files by name or pattern in the workspace

name: search_content
description: Search for content within files in the workspace

name: find_symbol
description: Find symbol definitions (functions, classes, etc.) in the workspace

name: git_status
description: Get Git repository status

name: git_diff
description: Get Git diff for staged or unstaged changes

name: git_branch_info
description: Get information about Git branches

name: suggest_commit_message
description: Suggest a commit message based on Git changes

name: analyze_dependencies
description: Analyze project dependencies and import relationships

name: get_dependency_tree
description: Get dependency tree for a specific file

name: find_importers
description: Find all files that import a specific module

name: detect_circular_deps
description: Detect circular dependencies in the project

name: analyze_call_graph
description: Analyze function call relationships in a file

name: find_callers
description: Find all places where a function is called

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.desc: Path to the file containing the function (optional)

name: trace_execution_path
description: Trace the execution path of a function call

arguments.name: functionName
arguments.desc: Name of the function to trace

name: get_call_tree
description: Get a tree of function calls in a file

arguments.name: maxDepth
arguments.desc: Maximum depth of the call tree (optional)

name: find_type_definition
description: Find the definition of a type or interface

name: get_type_info
description: Get detailed information about a type

name: find_type_usages
description: Find all usages of a type in the project

name: todo_create
description: Create a new todo item for the current project

arguments.name: priority
arguments.desc: Priority level: low, medium, high, urgent (default: medium)

name: todo_list
description: List todos for the current project with optional filters

name: todo_update
description: Update a todo item

arguments.name: id
arguments.desc: The ID of the todo to update

name: todo_complete
description: Mark a todo as completed

arguments.name: id
arguments.desc: The ID of the todo to complete

name: todo_delete
description: Delete a todo item

arguments.name: id
arguments.desc: The ID of the todo to delete

name: todo_stats
description: Get statistics about todos for the current project

name: switch_platform
description: Switch to a different AI platform (Claude, Cursor, etc.)

name: get_platform_status
description: Get status of all configured AI platforms

name: get_started
description: Get started guide for Context Sync

name: migrate_database
description: Migrate and optimize the Context Sync database

arguments.name: dryRun
arguments.desc: Preview changes without applying them (default: false)

name: analyze_conversation_context
description: Analyze conversation context and suggest improvements

name: suggest_missing_context
description: Suggest missing context that could be helpful
